name: Boys und Flugzeug: Become the pilot
name_original: Boys und Flugzeug: Become the pilot
description:
THIS IS AN EARLY VERSION OF THE GAME AND IS NOT FINISHED
EXPECT BUGS AND SPELLING ERRORS
(if you find any please report it in our discord)
THE MUSIC  IS CURRENTLY PLACEHOLDER

Have you ever dreamed about becoming a pilot?
Or have you dreamed about dating the girls from Girls und Panzer?
Perhaps both.
Then this is the visual novel for you, you shall use your knowledge about both dating and flying to achieve the best ending.
Wish you luck in the air and on the ground.

Join our discord!
Or join the official BuF discord.

Made with Suika 2
